pages.text: The $(bold)Market Board$() is a block that lets you access the $(l:overview/commodity_markets)Commodity Market$() of the village it's in. Simply interact with it to see the $(l:overview/goods)Goods$() that can be bought and sold there.$(p)Note that a Market Board will $(bold)not$() drop itself when broken, even with a Silk Touch tool. Take care not to accidentally destroy one!

New Market Boards can be crafted, albeit with a very expensive recipe. Note that this won't create a new $(l:overview/commodity_markets)Commodity Market$() unless you also build a village and populate it with villagers.
